actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Mine Safety and Health Act of 1977 to provide that the provisions of such Act shall not apply to stone mining operations, sand and gravel mining operations, or certain surface construction operations.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Mine Safety and Health Act of 1977 to provide that provisions of such Act shall not apply to stone mining, sand and gravel mining operations, or certain surface construction operations.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Mine Safety and Health Act of 1977 to provide that the provisions of such Act shall not apply to stone mining operations, sand and gravel mining operations, or certain surface construction operations.
